statements: SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data;
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumption FROM historical_energy_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT building_id, date FROM historical_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption < 100;
SELECT temperature, energy_consumption FROM historical_energy_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM historical_energy_data;
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumption, temperature FROM historical_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, energy_consumption, building_id, date FROM historical_energy_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY building_id ASC, date ASC;
SELECT building_id, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption, MONTH(date) AS month FROM historical_energy_data GROUP BY building_id, month ORDER BY avg_consumption DESC;
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM historical_energy_data GROUP BY building_id HAVING num_records > 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC, building_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed, date FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT building_name, energy_rating FROM building_energy_info WHERE energy_rating = 'A';
SELECT energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT building_name, energy_consumed FROM building_energy_info INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON building_energy_info.building_id = energy_consumption_data.building_id

SELECT building_name, energy_consumed FROM building_energy_info INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON building_energy_info.building_id = energy_consumption_data.building_id WHERE energy_consumed > 100

SELECT building_name, energy_rating, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM building_energy_info INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON building_energy_info.building_id = energy_consumption_data.building_id GROUP BY building_name, energy_rating
SELECT building_name, energy_rating FROM building_energy_info ORDER BY energy_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM buildings ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM buildings WHERE energy_rating='A';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT building_name, energy_consumed FROM buildings JOIN energy_consumption ON buildings.building_id = energy_consumption.building_id;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM buildings ORDER BY building_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM buildings WHERE energy_rating = 'A' ORDER BY construction_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN buildings b ON ec.building_id = b.building_id WHERE b.building_location = 'New York';
SELECT wd.reading_date, wd.temperature, ec.energy_consumed FROM weather_data wd LEFT JOIN energy_consumption ec ON wd.reading_date = ec.reading_date WHERE wd.weather_condition = 'Sunny';
SELECT * FROM building_energy_data;
SELECT building_id, energy_usage FROM building_energy_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM building_info WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT building_id, forecast_date, forecasted_energy_usage FROM energy_forecast WHERE forecasted_energy_usage < 500;
SELECT * FROM building_energy_data WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, energy_usage FROM building_energy_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT building_name, location FROM building_info ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT building_id, forecast_date, MAX(forecasted_energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM energy_forecast GROUP BY building_id, forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000;
SELECT building_id, building_name, construction_year FROM buildings ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, energy_type FROM buildings JOIN energy_usage ON buildings.building_id = energy_usage.building_id;
SELECT building_name, usage_amount, usage_date FROM energy_usage JOIN buildings ON energy_usage.building_id = buildings.building_id WHERE usage_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC, construction_year ASC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000;
SELECT building_name, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_energy_usage FROM buildings b JOIN energy_usage e ON b.building_id = e.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT b.building_name, COUNT(*) AS temperatures_recorded FROM buildings b JOIN temperature_data t ON b.building_id = t.building_id GROUP BY b.building_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT b.building_name, SUM(predicted_usage) AS total_forecasted_usage FROM buildings b JOIN energy_forecast f ON b.building_id = f.building_id GROUP BY b.building_name ORDER BY total_forecasted_usage DESC;
